column5: I went out with my buddy Rick (Gone Fishin) for a day perch fishing. I was going for perch and he was fishing for pike. Fishing from 9:30am to 2pm I caught my first fish through the ice and a PB Perch along with Rick getting his PB Northern Pike! A great 20minute fight this beast put out!  Had a great day!  A surprise Pike, my first pike/fish through the ice!   Now a 3lb Bowfin I caught up shallow while fishing for perch.   The best part is the Line snapped after this picture so I had to throw the camera and grab the fish quickly!  So, pike, bowfin..time for a Crappie now lol    Then the perch started to bite for me. I caught a average sized perch after the pike in the morning then came 2 12" perch then a 13" perch while I was on the phone lol...Pictures do not do the perch justice but for only catching 4 perch they were huge. The 13"er was a PB of mine by far  Perch #2   Perch #3   Perch #4   And the last photo of the day   Best ice fishing trip of mine so far!  Thanks, MTBF   O and here is a picture of Ricks Pike! This pike have him a great 20min fight. Wow, what a catch man. Congrads again on the PB!
Looks like lotsa fun and some real nice fish ta-boot!
WOW! Thats awesome Mike!  Congrats all around buddy!  Cheers, Ryan
Thats a great multi species day.  Bowfin through the ice. nice!
Way to go Mike, nice fish!
good job buddy
High Fives Mike ...
awsome report in the second last picture whats up with the open water in the background and no snow? where abouts are you
Lots of reasons to be smiling.
Reaching in and grabbing a bowfin?  Dude, you are lucky to have fingers, lol...

Lol, if you recall my yearly reports from my grandmas lake I useually catch and land 2 of them a yeat minimum so I have handled them lot's before. Nothing to hard for me to do. Just got to grab them right then fix the handle on them.  Thanks guys for the reply's! Really appreciate the help I have got but now I need to go out and buy some hooks and weights
some nice fish!
bowfin on the panfish tackle...that would be fantastic!!! Way to pop the ice cherry....something tells me we'll see more hardwater reports from you!
sooo jealous ..  couldnt get the car today so i had no ride.. might go out tomorrow.. fingers crossed
bowfin!!!!!  gj mikethebowfin master

Ataboy Mike Got to love getting into different species of fish on your first time out Congrats on your first and PB  Bowfin.... you seemed to be catching those all the time.  Mind as well change your handle to Mike the Bowfin Fisher Again great job and keep them reports coming!!! Thanks for sharing Leechman

Lol to yourself and leechman. I thought I might of had a walleye on or well something else. Wasn't sure but I got a good look at it when it came to the hole...then it went for a run again. A good 5-8minute fight it gave me. There fun to catch but after I caught that and before I caught it no Perch were under the ice where i was fishing. I went out to see my buddy catch his PB...Came back after 20minuted to check my rods and had a 12" perch on.  When they are around, nothing else is.
Excellent report Mike! Good on you!
That's quite a mixed bag o fish.  Not only have I never iced a bowfin, I've never caught one....period!
Good stuff...
Great Job Mike!
that's a great way to start your "ice fishing career" ! congrats!
